message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will bring you significant benefits. I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get us started. My initial offer for the product is $18,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I have to consider the value of the product to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. My revised offer is $16,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the benefits it will bring to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit below your target. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good price for the product. I'm thinking more along the lines of $17,000. This is a bit higher than your last offer, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. What do you think?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting a bit too far apart. I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, but I really need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to make one more serious offer, but I need you to meet me at a price that's closer to my minimum. My revised offer is $16,500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal here.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make a serious offer, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, but I'm still willing to try to reach a deal. However, I need to be clear that I'm at a point where I'm not willing to go much lower than my previous offer. I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need you to meet me at a price that's closer to my minimum. My revised offer is $16,000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.

Alice, I understand that you're trying to make a final concession, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
